posts.post_title: FS: A few T206 commons SGC Graded SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends. I would like to sell a few cards.  Prices include shipping.
PP Payment Owed/Gift please. 

Dougherty Arm In Air SGC 40 Sweet Cap 460 Fact. 42 OP  SOLD
Abbott SGC 40 Pied. 350 SOLD
Knabe SGC 30 Pied. 350 SOLD

Thank you very much for looking, and thank you very much to Adam and Zach!



Best,

Andy

posts.post_title: I will take the remaining two cards.
posts.post_content:
Abbott SGC 40 Pied. 350 $34
Knabe SGC 30 Pied. 350 $26

I will take the remaining two cards.

thanks
Zach Lawrence


Please send your email address, so I can send you payment. thanks
